originalText.text:
We had Kerman Protection in 5 of our locations for the past 34 years .
We are extremely happy with the service and the professional team , highly reliable. Will Highly recommend their Alarm company .

originalText.text:
Hi ,
I have had the best experience over the last 27 years of Kerman Protection protecting my store. Over the last almost three decades they have been giving us excellent service. They protect my store from not only from break-ins, but also notified me once when my next door neighbor had a fire in middle of the night.  They saved me from a lot of damage! I have had great experience with them and always refer them to different office and business owners .

originalText.text: I’ve been using Kerman Protection since I first opened my business in New York’s jewelry district over 20 years ago. Their technicians and monitoring team provide excellent service and are extremely reliable. With Kerman, you never feel like just a number.  They provide the most personalized service I’ve ever had with a company.  I highly recommend this company.

text.text: I’ve been using Kerman Protection since I first opened my business in New York’s jewelry district over 20 years ago. Their technicians and monitoring team provide excellent service and are extremely reliable. With Kerman, you never feel like just a number.  They provide the most personalized service I’ve ever had with a company.  I highly recommend this company.

originalText.text: I started to work with Kerman Protection less than two years. Of my experience with the company they’ve been very fair to me. For example I had eye surgery and I was out for ten weeks, they would call me to check on me and asked if I needed anything. But they assured me that my job would be secure when I got back but the most important thing they wanted to make sure that I was 100% healed. And it was my decision when I wanted to come back. Most jobs don’t give you that option. The pay could be a little better but their loyalty to me makes me very comfortable.

originalText.text: We've been using Kerman Protection for over 20 years, throughout over 25 of our locations, to keep our stores safe! Great team and great service! 10/10 would recommend them for any home or spot you want protected!
